# Read the data

```{r}
data <- read.delim("Data/testExecution.csv", sep = ",", header = T, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

```{r}
testExecutionValidationErrors <- data %>% 
  filter(original != validation)

write.csv(testExecutionValidationErrors,"Data/testExecutionValidationErrors.csv", row.names = FALSE)

data %>% 
  filter(original != validation & original != JCov & original != JaCoCo & original != JVM & original != Yajta)


```
